Quote from GM Elysani:

Hello again everyone!

I've sent another e-mail out to MHO officers whose organizations are in danger of demotion or removal from the system, but I wanted to post here as well in hopes that I can get in contact with them.

If you are an officer in one of the following organizations, please check your inbox or contact me as soon as possible:

Moonshine Manor Clan Jakarta The Ardenai Temple Knights The Coterie of the Swan The Eahnor Assembly The Order of the Azure Sun Beautifully Awkward Elanthians Guardians of Elanthia The Order of the Umbral Moon The Magicians

Guru of MHO Things. MHO ALL THE THINGS: https://sites.google.com/site/gs4mho/home

Please e-mail me if you have any MHO related questions or concerns!
